Uses of Interface
java.nio.file.attribute.FileAttributeView

Packages that use FileAttributeView
Package
Description
java.nio.file
Defines interfaces and classes for the Java virtual machine to access files, file attributes, and file systems.
java.nio.file.attribute
Interfaces and classes providing access to file and file system attributes.
java.nio.file.spi
Service-provider classes for the java.nio.file package.

  • Uses of FileAttributeView in java.nio.file

    Method
    Description
    static <V extends FileAttributeView>
    V
    Files.getFileAttributeView(Path path, Class<V> type, LinkOption... options)
    Returns a file attribute view of a given type.
    <V extends FileAttributeView>
    V
    SecureDirectoryStream.getFileAttributeView(Class<V> type)
    Returns a new file attribute view to access the file attributes of this directory.
    <V extends FileAttributeView>
    V
    SecureDirectoryStream.getFileAttributeView(T path, Class<V> type, LinkOption... options)
    Returns a new file attribute view to access the file attributes of a file in this directory.
    Method parameters in java.nio.file with type arguments of type FileAttributeView
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    abstract boolean
    FileStore.supportsFileAttributeView(Class<? extends FileAttributeView> type)
    Tells whether or not this file store supports the file attributes identified by the given file attribute view.

  • Uses of FileAttributeView in java.nio.file.attribute

    Subinterfaces of FileAttributeView in java.nio.file.attribute
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    AclFileAttributeView
    A file attribute view that supports reading or updating a file's Access Control Lists (ACL) or file owner attributes.
    interface 
    BasicFileAttributeView
    A file attribute view that provides a view of a basic set of file attributes common to many file systems.
    interface 
    DosFileAttributeView
    A file attribute view that provides a view of the legacy "DOS" file attributes.
    interface 
    FileOwnerAttributeView
    A file attribute view that supports reading or updating the owner of a file.
    interface 
    PosixFileAttributeView
    A file attribute view that provides a view of the file attributes commonly associated with files on file systems used by operating systems that implement the Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX) family of standards.
    interface 
    UserDefinedFileAttributeView
    A file attribute view that provides a view of a file's user-defined attributes, sometimes known as extended attributes.

    Description

    V
    FileSystemProvider.getFileAttributeView(Path path, Class<V> type, LinkOption... options)
    Returns a file attribute view of a given type.
